item.title: We need hospitals more than football stadiums, say Morocco's young protesters
item.description: Morocco will soon have the world's largest football stadium but this has angered many young people who want better services.

item.title: 'Machines don't see gender': India's first female train driver on blazing the trail
item.description: Surekha Yadav became a train driver at a time when it was uncommon for Indian women to take up the profession.

item.title: They're making sex jokes in Saudi: Inside the controversial comedy festival
item.description: A-listers including Dave Chappelle, Bill Burr and Jack Whitehall have faced a backlash over the event.

item.title: Money paid but no ship: The around-the-world cruise that is yet to set sail
item.description: The BBC has been speaking to retirees who want the firm selling the cruise to stop advertising and refund their deposits.

item.title: Suspected drones force second Munich airport closure in 24 hours
item.description: Flights were suspended at 21:30 local time, with around 6,500 passengers affected.
